purpleculture_pinyin:
bǎi
to arrange; to exhibit; to move to and fro; a pendulum
устроить; выставлять; двигаться взад и вперед; маятник
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 摆)
Pictophonetic: 罷 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
擺脫 [ bǎi tuō ]: to break away from; to cast off (old ideas etc); to get rid of; to break away (from); to break out (of); to free oneself from; to extricate oneself
擺放 [ bǎi fàng ]: to set up; to arrange; to lay out
擺動 [ bǎi dòng ]: to sway; to swing; to move back and forth; to oscillate
擺布 [ bǎi bù ]: to arrange; to order about; to manipulate
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 罷 [ bà ] to cease, to finish, to stop, to quit
heisig_chinese_memo: Cease trying to put in order things to do on your fingers. Write a to do list on a piece of paper.
Ru_trainchinese:
bǎi: (глаг) ставить, класть, располагать; напускать на себя, делать вид
bǎi: (глаг) качать, махать, вилять
bǎi: (сущ) нижняя часть (куртки и т.д.); подол, нижний край (юбки)
bǎi: (сущ) маятник (в часах)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Polic put in order people who cause trouble.  At first they use their fingers to cease the people's movement peacefully.  In the case that people resist they move on to other means.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " hand " and " stop ", the original meaning is separation. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty-Ma Rong Biography": "Then put the animals in the animal class, and give rewards." Li Xian's note: ""Guang Ya" said: "Shoot, open it." 』」

" Pendant " can mean exclusion. Song Zenggong, "The New Hall of the Guanyin Academy of the Capital": "Suddenly, I stunned and clambered up and clashed.

" Pendant " also means arrangement and placement. "Water Margin" Chapter 87: "You put the nine palaces and gossip array, who do you want to hide?"

" Pendulum " can also mean shaking or swinging. Tang Jiaoran, "Five-character opera for Xue Yi": "Where is the prosperity of the king? The spring breeze puts the green poplar."

" Pendant " also means mercy. "The Scholars" Chapter 4: "On the second day, Mr. Liu Lao was demoted to the magistrate of Qingtian County, and he was put to death with poison."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " hand " and " stop ", the original meaning is to separate.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「罷」聲，本義為分開。《後漢書‧馬融傳》：「然後擺牲班禽，淤賜犒功。」李賢注：「《廣雅》曰：『捭，開也。』《字書》：『擺，亦捭也。』」

　　「擺」可表示排除。宋曾鞏〈京師觀音院新堂〉：「頓驚俯仰遠囂濁，豈直形骸擺羈束。」

　　「擺」也表示排列、安放。《水滸傳》第87回：「你擺九宮八卦陣，待要瞞誰？」

　　「擺」還可表示搖動、擺動。唐皎然〈五言戲贈薛彝〉：「何處銷君興，春風擺綠楊。」

　　「擺」亦表示擺佈。《儒林外史》第4回：「到第二日，把劉老先生貶為青田縣知縣，又用毒藥擺死了。」
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
擺 (Simplified: 摆)
Pinyin: bǎi
English Definition: to arrange; to exhibit; to move to and fro; a pendulum
Total strokes: 18; Radical: 手
Pictophonetic: 罷 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 罷 [ bà ] to cease, to finish, to stop, to quit
Example Words:
擺脫 [ bǎi tuō ]: to break away from; to cast off (old ideas etc); to get rid of; to break away (from); to break out (of); to free oneself from; to extricate oneself
擺放 [ bǎi fàng ]: to set up; to arrange; to lay out
擺動 [ bǎi dòng ]: to sway; to swing; to move back and forth; to oscillate
擺布 [ bǎi bù ]: to arrange; to order about; to manipulate
More: 擺* | *擺 | *擺*

(Simplified: 摆)
Pictophonetic: 罷 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 5
Chinese: Cease trying to put in order things to do on your fingers. Write a to do list on a piece of paper.
Meaning: put in order
Hanzi: 摆
Story: Polic put in order people who cause trouble. At first they use their fingers to cease the people's movement peacefully. In the case that people resist they move on to other means.
Kind: traditional
從「 手 」，「 罷 」聲，本義為分開。《後漢書‧馬融傳》：「然後擺牲班禽，淤賜犒功。」李賢注：「《廣雅》曰：『捭，開也。』《字書》：『擺，亦捭也。』」 「 擺 」可表示排除。宋曾鞏〈京師觀音院新堂〉：「頓驚俯仰遠囂濁，豈直形骸擺羈束。」 「 擺 」也表示排列、安放。《水滸傳》第87回：「你擺九宮八卦陣，待要瞞誰？」 「 擺 」還可表示搖動、擺動。唐皎然〈五言戲贈薛彝〉：「何處銷君興，春風擺綠楊。」 「 擺 」亦表示擺佈。《儒林外史》第4回：「到第二日，把劉老先生貶為青田縣知縣，又用毒藥擺死了。」
From the sound of " hand" and " stop", the original meaning is separation. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty-Ma Rong Biography": "Then put the animals in the animal class, and give rewards." Li Xian's note: ""Guang Ya" said: "Shoot, open it." 』」 " Pendant" can mean exclusion. Song Zenggong, "The New Hall of the Guanyin Academy of the Capital": "Suddenly, I stunned and clambered up and clashed. " Pendant" also means arrangement and placement. "Water Margin" Chapter 87: "You put the nine palaces and gossip array, who do you want to hide?" " Pendulum" can also mean shaking or swinging. Tang Jiaoran, "Five-character opera for Xue Yi": "Where is the prosperity of the king? The spring breeze puts the green poplar." " Pendant" also means mercy. "The Scholars" Chapter 4: "On the second day, Mr. Liu Lao was demoted to the magistrate of Qingtian County, and he was put to death with poison."

擺字的基本解释

擺
bǎi
见“摆”。

擺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǎi］
［《廣韻》北買切，上蟹，幫。］
亦作“1”。“摆1”的繁体字。
(1)分开。
(2)排除；摆脱。
(3)排列；安放。
(4)陈述，说。
(5)炫耀；显出。
(6)击毁；击。
(7)摇动；摆动。
(8)指摇摇摆摆地走。
(9)摆布。
(10)摆渡。参见“擺渡”。
(11)包。
(12)“擺子”的省称。
(13)耙。一种碎土、和土的农业器械。
(14)傣族语“集会”的音译。解放前傣族地区小乘佛教的群众性集会称摆。解放后傣族人民将一切群众性集会泛称为摆，近似庙会。
(15)在一端固定的细线下，垂有一定重量的物体，能做往复运动的一种装置。细线长度固定且振幅不大时，运动周期恒等。
(16)钟表或精密仪器上用来控制摆动频率的一种机械装置。如手表中有摆轮，也叫“擺”。

擺字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擺； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页461第19
【唐韻】北買切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】補買切，?拜上聲。開也，撥也。排而振之也。【馬融·廣成頌】擺牲班禽。【張協·七命】鉤爪摧，鋸牙擺。【韓愈詩】乾坤擺雷硠。　又【集韻】部買切，牌上聲。義同。本作擺。亦作?。通作捭。

擺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
擺字的起名意思

暂无。

put
Basic explanation of words
put
bǎi
See "pendulum".
put
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǎi］
["Guangyun" North buy cut, crab, help. ]
Also called "1". Traditional Chinese characters for "擊1".
(1) Separate.
(2) Eliminate; get rid of.
(3) Arrange; place.
(4) State, say.
(5) To show off; to show off.
(6) Wreck; hit.
(7) Shake; swing.
(8) Refers to walking swayingly.
(9) At the mercy.
(10) Ferry. See "ferry".
(11) Package.
(12) The provincial name of "pendulum".
(13) Rake. An agricultural equipment for crushing and mixing soil.
(14) The transliteration of "Assembly" in Dai language. The mass gatherings of Hinayana Buddhism in Dai areas before liberation were called pendulums. After the liberation, the Dai people referred to all mass gatherings as pendulums, similar to temple fairs.
(15) A device capable of reciprocating movement with a certain weight hanging from a thin line fixed at one end. When the length of the thin line is fixed and the amplitude is not large, the movement period is constant.
(16) A mechanical device used on clocks or precision instruments to control the oscillation frequency. If there is a balance wheel in a watch, it is also called a "pendulum".

[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　 Pendulum; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 461 Page 19
[Tang Yun] North Buy and Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Make up to buy and cut, please come to the sound. Open, dial too. Row and vibrate too. 【Ma Rong·Guangcheng Song】Put the poultry in the animal class. [Zhang Xie·Seven Lives] The hooks are destroyed, and the saw teeth swing. [Han Yushi] The universe puts thunder.　 [Ji Yun] Buy and cut, the card is on. The same meaning. This is a pendulum. Also for?. Pass for 捭.
